name: gyration
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the act of turning around and around on a fixed point: Push your hips back and forth and avoid circular gyration. He could make the car do all kinds of crazy gyrations.
the act of dancing, especially in a sexual way: It was a night of endless dancing and gyration. Mata Hari electrified countless stages with her free-spirited gyrations.
